attributes.action: I want the government to give more opportunities for young people in Manchester.
attributes.additional_details: Most young people aged between 16 - 24 are resigned to getting jobs in shops or warehouses and not following their dreams due to a lack of opportunities. If I work in a warehouse for the rest of my life, I fear for the fact that I won't have adequate funding to feed my family and give my children the best lives possible.
attributes.background: I want more opportunities for younger people in Manchester aged from 16 - 24 because for me, apprenticeships are few and far between and very difficult to secure.
